channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Adapting To Hyperspeed Technology Trends To Gain Market Advantage
item.description: Adapting to hyperspeed technology trends requires agility, innovation and customer focus.

item.title: Long-term selfish (and the circles of us and now)

item.title: Getting precise about tolerance

item.title: The Mona Lisa problem

item.title: Vertical AI: The Body That Brings The Brain To Life
item.description: Vertical AI is designed to address the unique needs of specific industries using specialized data and tailored algorithms.

item.title: Leading Your Business With Compassion
item.description: Compassionate leadership shouldn't be just a buzzword. It’s a framework that should permeate your team.
